description:
Infinite Banking Made Simple is a course that will teach you how to increase your wealth by Becoming Your Own Banker. This course is for business men and women, real estate investors, stock market traders, or anyone looking for what it takes to generate lasting wealth.

Wealth Strategist and President/CEO of Paradigm Life, Patrick Donohoe, will take you through a series of short videos that explains what the Infinite Banking Concept (IBC) is, how it works, and how to successfully implement privatized banking into your overall wealth picture.

Your take-away points from this course will be:

  • An understanding of how privatized banking can increase your cash flow and give you a steady rate of return
  • How to use the IBC for an ample retirement
  • How to maximize the opportunity cost of your money
  • How privatized banking protects your wealth


The ultra-rich have used the Infinite Banking Concept for decades to build and maintain a financial legacy, and this course will teach you exactly how to do the very same thing.

Since the conception of the Federal Reserve in 1913, and the central banking system, banks today have learned how to leverage your money to earn over 100% profit. This economic principle of leveraging makes banks some of the richest corporations in the world. By learning how to infinitely bank, you can implement the same system that central banks use today for your personal profit. Using the Infinite Banking System isn't just a smart way to maximize your dollar and build wealth, it protects you from financial insecurity.

This course will enlighten you on how to maximize the opportunity cost of your money, and how to build and sustain sincere wealth. Using a privatized banking system will not only help you obtain financial freedom, it also protects you, your business, your family from the volatile market and unpredictable economy.

The Infinite Banking Concept will change your financial life forever.
title: Infinite Banking Simplified
